name: oximetry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of measuring the level of oxygen in someone's blood using a special device, usually attached to their finger: Oximetry was carried out in 87 normal healthy children. Oximetry is not as accurate as the measurement of arterial blood gases.
More examplesFewer examplesOvernight oximetry is done to see if oxygen concentrations decrease during sleep.Three oximetry readings were taken while the child was breathing room air and the average reading was used.
